https://tmrev.io/movie/251193-Ai wa mieru: Zenmô fûfu ni yadotta chiisana inochi 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dvM6JRQy6CmysrR4Gnyw0ANRwkp.jpg Ueto Aya's is Juri Tatematsu. She's blind like her husband. They give birth to a child, despite fears and opposition from their parents. Raising the child, Juri keeps pushing herself towards her dream of becoming a professional musician. She made her dream come true. Ai wa mieru: Zenmô fûfu ni yadotta chiisana inochi
